tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_date DATE,
    amount DECIMAL,
    description TEXT,
    department_name TEXT,
    donor_name TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE expenses (
    expense_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    expense_date DATE,
    amount DECIMAL,
    description TEXT,
    category VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE donations (
  donation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  donor_name VARCHAR,
  donation_amount DECIMAL,
  donation_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE expenses (
  expense_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  expense_type VARCHAR,
  expense_amount DECIMAL,
  expense_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE disaster_relief (
  relief_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR,
  relief_date DATE,
  total_expenses DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE expenses (
    expense_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    expense_date DATE,
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    category VARCHAR(50),
    notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE disaster_operations (
    operation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    operation_name VARCHAR(100),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    location VARCHAR(100),
    status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE operation_expenses (
    expense_id INT,
    operation_id INT,
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    PRIMARY KEY (expense_id, operation_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (expense_id) REFERENCES expenses(expense_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (operation_id) REFERENCES disaster_operations(operation_id)
);
